nodes.text: Zir-Daggoth was a pink-skinned, male Gran with black eyes who worked as a merchant during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During the war he setup shop on the planet Alderaan, where he ran a stall selling a variety of goods within the estate of the Great House of Organa. He wore brown clothing and carried a blaster pistol.

Zir-Daggoth first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, an MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game he served as a Republic speciality goods vendor on the planet Alderaan. His location was marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, the game's accompanying strategy guide by Prima Games; however, it uses the name "Zir Daggoth."
